entry.title: relax and enjoy the ride
entry.summary:
Author: goforeddie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,994Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 67

Summary: The driver, whose attention is on the road ahead, click his tongue in his mouth and shake his head in disappointment. Then, he look over his shoulder and say, “Say, Mr.Diaz, is your pet misbehaving tonight?”   The question stuns both of them. He can feel Buck’s hand freezing on top of his knee and can hear the gasps escaping his boyfriend’s mouth as he hears the question. They’ve never scene with someone else, ever, and let’s just say that they never expected to do it with a complete stranger.   Still, something hot build up in his belly and Eddie turn his attention back on Buck. His boyfriend does the same, a question in his eyes. They stare at each other for a beat, as if to say “so, what do you think?” and “Just say the safe word and we’re done” except it’s not what Buck says.   No, Buck wet his lips and speaks up slightly louder, “Have I? Sir?”

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 156,771Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 170,738Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 143,653Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Something Just Like This
entry.summary:
Author: penpen_xo

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,950Chapters: 2/10Kudos: 5

Summary: 6 months into a life post Bobby, Captain Hen Wilson needs to fill a vacant spot on A Shift. She just never expected her former captains hand to play into her decision.If only she could get a certain curly haired firefighter to play nicely with their new probie. But he's made it pretty clear he doesn't think they need anyone new.-Rosie Bishop has lost too many families in her young life already, and now she was going to have navigate entering a new, very close knit one, while trying to keep her own heart safe.She wasn't trying to be best friends with any of them, she just wanted to get through each day, help people, and get her much needed pay check.However, if the cold shoulder and icy stares are anything to go by, then firefighter Buckley seems to have decided that she shouldn't be there at all. What she doesn't realise is that no matter how hard anyone tries, it wouldn't be the 118 if it wasn't a family, and families stick together. or Season 9 story.Buddie focused + OC and lots of firefam feels as the team heals and learns to open their hearts again, helping a young girl find her place in a very lonely world along the way.

entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Summary: For a heartbeat, neither of them moved. The morning sun glinted off her hair, the hum of a passing car filling the silence. Shannon shifted first, swallowing hard, her shoulders rising with a shaky breath. “Hi,” she said, her voice soft, tentative. “I’m… I’m Shannon. Eddie’s…” She faltered, her eyes flicking down, then back up to meet his. “Christopher’s mom.” Or, War didn’t break them. Distance didn’t. Shannon just might.

entry.title: Anniversary
entry.summary:
Author: inkinmyheartandonthepage

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,356Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 41

Summary: “Anniversary of what?” Eddie asked, unable to keep the amused smile of his lips. Buck’s smile didn’t falter as he made his way over to the bench. He sat down heavily next to Eddie on the bench, letting his duffel bag fall from his shoulder with a soft thump. He pressed the white box into Eddie’s hand, leaving no choice but for the single father to take it. “I don’t know,” Buck shrugged easily. “Pick something.”

entry.title: Drop The Act!
entry.summary:
Author: Dark_Phantom248

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,585Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 16

Summary: “Who's your favorite character?” Buck asked, a smirk playing on his lips.Eddie sat there, thinking, for a moment before he said, “I think Tyler is my favorite. I mean, sure, he's hunting down Ollie and being really stupid, but the way his character has progressed since he was first shown on screen an hour ago, it just shows how much life can change people, and I relate to that.”Buck liked hearing that from Eddie because Buck had been the one to pitch the idea for his character to have a redemption by the time the end credits hit. Have everyone hate him at the beginning, and then slowly reveal small snips of his past that help everyone understand why Tyler is the way he is.“I also like the way the actor is portraying him,” Eddie tacks on, and that makes Buck extremely happy because he IS that actor. At that moment, Eddie turned his gaze onto Buck. Buck blinked twice before Eddie spoke, “Buck, you said this is one of your favorite movies, so do you know who plays Tyler?” And of course Eddie would ask that.OREvan "Buck" Buckley is an actor who goes by the name Daniel Buckley, and his family doesn't know.
